full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GNOD SBYIN CHEN PO RDO RJE BDUD 'DUL GYI BSKANG GSO'I RIM PA BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES @006B GNOD SBYIN CHEN PO RDO RJE BDUD 'DUL GYI BSKANG GSO'I RIM PA BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, RIGS RUS MCHOG TU DGE ZHING, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA, RIG GNAS MTHA' DAG LA MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN YANGS GA-YO BA'I SDE BA RNAM SRAS DZAM LA ZHES BYA BAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, MDO RGYUD DAM PA'I MAN DANG 'DZIN PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, 'DI'I SGRUB THABS SLOB DPON PADMAS MDZAD PA GRAGS PA DANG, GRVA BA MNGON SHES KYIS MDZAD ZER BA'I YIG RNYING 'GA' ZHIG 'DUG KYANG, SNGA MO NAS BRGYUD PAS BRIS NOR MNGON CHE ZHING, PHAL TSIG RING THUNG YANG MI SNYOMS PA YID BRTAN DKA' BA DANG, GZHAN MA KHUNGS BTZUN PA'I GTOR CHOG PA, TZANG MA ZHIG MA MTHONG YANG, 'DI'I RJES GZHAN LAS TSOGS RAGS RIM DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA'I ZHABS DRUNG DU THOB PA'I GDAMS LO TZTSA BA DGE 'DUN DPAL 'BAR RO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
